entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
